The ROCKET impacts the bulldozer on the left; the EXPLOSI actually FLIPS the huge machine head over tail into the a The bulldozer lands upside down on the lane divider, crus a portion of it. Colonel Lee rolls up his windows and drives around the bu wreckage. The other drivers really give him wide berth now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Approaching downtown, Colonel Lee turns onto the 110 nort

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traffic moves aside for Colonel Lee's notorious Mercedes. Carson catches up to it. DAVE (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...The Strela-2 needs 45 meters to arm, so stay tight on his ass. Carson SLAMS his Volvo into the Mercedes. Ambassador Han braces himself on the dashboard. Carson looks over at him CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That Kraut-mobile have any weaknesses you'd like to tell me about? AMBASSADOR HAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think so -- they said it was solid as a rock. CARSON (looks at his crumpled car)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No shit... As Carson moves forward, Colonel Lee's window opens enoug allow the barrel of his AMD-74 machine gun to poke throug Carson shoves Ambassador Han's head down and ducks. Colon Lee STRAFES the Volvo. Carson looks up just in time to see... A pickup truck, ahead, stalled on the shoulder. Carson slams on the brakes, but it's too late... The Volv CRASHES headfirst into the back of the truck. The Volvo's AIRBAGS deploy, stopping Carson and Ambassado from plowing into the dashboard. After a beat: AMBASSADOR HAN (dazed)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe I'm still alive... CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This were a Hyundai you wouldn't be. Ambassador Han looks at Carson, wondering if he's putting on. The car is a twisted mess. Carson can't get the door

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A red and white LAFD paramedic's ambulance puts on its SI and hurries to the Volvo. Two PARAMEDICS jump out. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me out of here... They pry his door open with a crowbar. Carson climbs onto roof of his car. Grimacing from pain, he looks around. CARSON (continuing; into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anybody see him? MIRANDA (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still heading north on the 110. The Paramedics pry the passenger door open and help Ambas Han out. Carson looks at the ambulance. He's getting an i CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave... You're sure those rockets are heat-seeking? DAVE (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Classic IR, reflective optical system. How come? CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just keep working your leads... Carson climbs into the back of the ambulance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson rummages through the supplies, finds what he's loo for, and (BELOW FRAME) starts stuffing them into a canvas

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson climbs onto the roof of the ambulance. CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Carson. I need a copter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone in the grounded helicopters -- LAPD, National Gu Marines, media -- react to Carson's request as if he's cr CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something small and nimble. Anybody... come in low, from the south... I'm on an ambulance by the 9th Street exit. MIRANDA (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you out of your mind?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bobbi is standing next to her copter in the back of the minimart, listening to this exchange on a POLICE SCANNER. Cameraman is eating a microwave burrito. Bobbi jumps in, the ENG camera, and yells at her Pilot: BOBBI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get this fuckin' thing in the air! (to Cameraman)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out! Not enough room for four. CAMERAMAN (as they TAKE OFF)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I supposed to do when the plague comes, hold my breath?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They rapidly cut through the traffic. MIRANDA (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switch to a secure channel. (flips a switch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What on earth are you thinking? CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll make him open the sunroof. Someone can shoot tear gas or a percussion grenade inside. MIRANDA (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pete, you haven't gone... suicidal or anything on me, have you? CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way. I couldn't stand making so many people happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson waves his arms as he sees a helicopter approaching The glare from the sun masks the copter's markings. It HO above him. With the canvas bag slung over his shoulder, C jumps up onto the runner, then climbs up inside the cockp

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson closes the door, then sees Bobbi. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You?! I wanted a police copter! PILOT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just tell me what to do. I flew two tours in 'Nam. BOBBI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he doesn't go unless I go! CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong-o...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens and Bobbi comes TUMBLING out of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're hovering above the roof of a high-rise hotel down Bobbi lands with a huge SPLASH in the rooftop swimming po

dialogues.speaker: BOBBI
dialogues.text: surfaces, sputtering and screaming: BOBBI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a respected electronic journalist, you fuckin' prick!! Carson replies by tossing her industrial-sized bottle of Mylanta out after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the distance, there is smog on the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They follow the 110 north. Ahead, Carson sees the Mercede cutting across lanes. CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got 'im -- looks like he's headed for the 101.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson has the Pilot hover just above and behind the Merc It comes to a stop and the sunroof opens up. Carson lashes himself to the copter's center post with a of the seat harness, then slides the door open. He reaches into the canvas bag and takes out a road flare breaks the flare open, IGNITING it. CARSON (to Pilot)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull hard to the left, on my signal... He braces himself on door jamb... Below, Colonel Lee's head pokes up from the sunroof.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colonel Lee calmly aims the rocket launcher and FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson tosses the lit flare, hard, away from the helicopt CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now! The Pilot swings the helicopter in the other direction, a the rocket FOLLOWS the flare, streaking past the helicopt A few seconds later, the rocket EXPLODES in midair behind

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda sees what Carson is doing. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You fucking lunatic!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The News Pilot looks over at Carson. PILOT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hope you got more flares than he's got rockets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda and the L.A. Cop, both holding small tear gas pis split up. Crouching behind the cars on the freeway, they up on the stopped Mercedes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson takes another flare out of the canvas bag. He brea the top off... and it doesn't ignite. Below, Colonel Lee loads another rocket into the launcher

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda is climbing the metal stairs leading to a graffit covered freeway sign.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson fumbles to pull another flare out of the canvas ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Avoiding coils of razor-sharp concertina wire around the Miranda FIRES a tear gas canister at the Mercedes' sunroo It misses, bouncing off the windshield, filling the area white smoke. Colonel Lee keeps his eye on the copter...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson gets the new flare lit and throws it away from the copter just as Colonel Lee FIRES another rocket. The rocket EXPLODES a few dozen yards away. Shrapnel PEPP the copter, DAMAGING the rear rotor. Struggling to maintain control, the Pilot heads for the S Street on-ramp, below the freeway, out of the line of fir

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colonel Lee spots Miranda, up on the freeway sign, loadin another tear gas canister. He STRAFES the sign. She flattens; the BULLETS tear through the sign above her The L.A. Cop rushes the Mercedes. Colonel Lee FIRES at hi hitting him across the legs. Colonel Lee ducks back into the Mercedes and drives away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Miranda comes down from the sign... Carson climbs up the embankment from Sixth Street to the The downed L.A. Cop waves as a pair of ambulances drive u lights flashing and sirens WAILING. Carson runs alongside one of the ambulances, pulling the driver's door open before it's stopped. The Paramedic is the one who helped him and Ambassador Ha of the Volvo. Carson yanks him out of his ambulance. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson jumps in. Miranda climbs in the passenger's side. peels away, Miranda smacks Carson on the head. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're completely deranged! Playing chicken with rockets! CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what the hell were you doing out there? AMBASSADOR HAN (OS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are both of you doing? Carson turns, surprised and annoyed to see Ambassador Han arm bandaged, lying in the cot in the back. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, for Christ's sake... Hold on! Lights and SIRENS going, they rush into the 110/101 inter Ahead, Colonel Lee's Mercedes is driving through the cars are parting like the Red Sea for him. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even if we can pry him out with... (looks at her watch)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve minutes to go, I doubt he'll be very cooperative. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll just use my outstanding people skills. Carson glances up at the sign showing the upcoming exit: Glendale Blvd - Echo Park. A thought is forming... CARSON (continuing; to Ambassador Han)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That car's like a rock, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson suddenly cuts to the left. When they reach the Gle Blvd exit, he SLAMS the ambulance into the side of the Mercedes, forcing it onto the freeway off-ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson pushes the Mercedes across Bellevue Avenue, toward park surrounding Echo Lake. Colonel Lee STRAFES the ambul

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson keeps BUMPING the Mercedes as they reach Glendale running right alongside the lake. With a hard shove, Carson sends the Mercedes SKIDDING off road, through the small guardrail, and INTO the lake. Carson slams on the brakes, fishtailing the ambulance int grass surrounding the lake. Sig 9mm in hand, he hops out. The Mercedes is so heavy that it's already half-submerged

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WATER pours in from the floorboards, the air vents... Colonel Lee climbs out through the sunroof and FIRES at C with his AMD-74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson ducks behind the ambulance, takes careful aim... And SHOOTS Colonel Lee, WINGING him in the shoulder. Colo Lee's machine gun goes flying, and he tumbles into the wa Meanwhile, Cops, Army, Marines, etc. arrive via helicopte car. Major Vreeland is among them. The news media, ENG ca bouncing on their shoulders, run alongside them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson races over to grab Colonel Lee, who is slogging ou the lake. There is a glint of bright steel... and Colonel SLASHES at Carson with a knife. Carson moves aside... but the knife SLICES across his upp arm. Carson falls backwards. Colonel Lee, on hands and knees, tries to crawl away. Sud someone KICKS him in face, flipping him over. It's Miranda. Colonel Lee's knife goes flying. Carson, bleeding, piles onto Colonel Lee. Vreeland assist Colonel Lee fights like mad to break free... Until Miranda JAMS her heel into his groin. He cries out. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever hear of "fuck-me" pumps? Well, these are fuck you pumps! (pushes harder)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's the family? Surprised at his wife's new negotiating technique, Carson shoots a look at Vreeland. Vreeland grimaces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave sits in front of his computer, phone receiver restin his shoulder, riveted by the ACTION on the TV. DAVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy shit -- Knoll-It-All's turned into Dirty Harriet! He turns as his MODEM squawks and another download comes DAVE (continuing; into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure there were no accounts in the other names I gave you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Miranda continues to apply encouragement to Colonel Lee's gonads, Ambassador Han limps over. He yells some OR at Colonel Lee. After a moment, Colonel Lee sags. AMBASSADOR HAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him up. Carson's not so sure, but they're completely surrounded b military and law enforcement personnel. He releases his g Miranda removes her heel. Then, with lightning reflexes, Colonel Lee grabs Vreeland Rock Island Arsenal Colt .45 Auto from its snap-holster. COLONEL LEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victory! Carson dives back onto him. But he twists his arm around PULLS the trigger -- with the muzzle underneath his own c Carson, Miranda and Ambassador Han are SPRAYED with his b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dumbfounded everybody looks at each other... Carson, dogged, kneels next to Colonel Lee's body and sea through his pockets, looking for something, anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ahead, in the distance, the coastline comes into view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The family stares at the TV. Mrs. Han purses her lips... fighting it... a tear rolls down her face. The time: 4:51

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson reaches for his two-way radio. CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave is looking at the TV, paying no attention to his computer.

dialogues.speaker: INCLUDE COMPUTER
dialogues.text: as some bank records are being downloaded: faxed IMAGES o processed checks SCROLL down the screen. CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything else come through? DAVE (numb; into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a hint. We're screwed. CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet... Shaking his head, Dave glances at his computer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just in time to glimpse the words "First & Last + Dep one of the checks as it scrolls off the screen.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: fumbles to scroll back to the check. DAVE (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! One of Javal's alias accounts: check for an apartment rental! CARSON (VO) (thru radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're shittin'... Where?!

dialogues.speaker: WINDOW
dialogues.text: Through the sheer curtains over the window we can SEE the family sitting in their booby-trapped chairs. DAVE (VO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Park La Brea! We PULL BACK... they're way up in a high-rise building... CAMERA continues to PULL BACK, farther and farther... ...REVEALING 4,222 apartment units, on 168 acres. The bui in which the apartment is located is one of 18 identical, story towers standing side-by-side in a series of hexagon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vreeland's Apache helicopter LIFTS OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda looks at Carson, then checks her watch. 4:52. CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...Have the Manager evacuate the complex. Find out which unit the family's in, but don't let anyone go in 'til we get there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave, re-energized, is juggling the phone and the radio. DAVE (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Private security's going around with PA's, and they set off the fire alarm. (into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, try callin' him again! (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manager's gone, and the Assistant can't find the key to get to the rental manifest. (into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then kick the fuckin' door down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dense Assistant Manager, MILTON, stands in the outer office, staring at the inner office's closed door. MILTON (into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll try him in his car again... During this, outside: WESTEC GUARDS (OS) (thru car-mounted PA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tenants -- leave your apartments at once... Take the stairs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carson sticks the radio in his pocket and looks at Mirand CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Fuck-you" pumps??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hostages can hear the WHOOPING fire alarms and the (O ANNOUNCEMENT. Joy looks at Mrs. Han, hopeful. JOY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must know we're here... ALL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help! No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Police cars, military vehicles, fire trucks, etc. converg the complex from all directions. Several helicopters circle the complex. One has a PA in i VOICE THRU PA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han family. Show us your location...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The family listens, frustrated, as the HELICOPTERS circle Joy carefully slides her arm along the arm rest, then tri coax something out of her pocket -- her Zippo lighter. JOY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mother... Sam... They look over at her as she lights it. After a beat, Mrs understands... She hesitates, then: MRS. HAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it. Joy drops the lighter to the floor, then swats it with he foot to Mrs. Han. She does the same, passing it to Sam, w sitting closest to the window. With one eye on the VU movement meter, Sam kicks the ligh sliding it across the carpet toward the curtains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several COPS and MARINES burst into the office. Milton, t Assistant Manager, cowers as they SHOOT the lock off the to the inner office and rush in. MILTON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a brown binder... Says "Rental Manifest." You can't miss it... They literally tear the office apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIRE is consuming the curtains. Thick, toxic SMOKE be to fill the tiny apartment, and everyone starts coughing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They circle, overwhelmed by the sheer number of apartment CARSON (into radio)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apartment number would be real helpful, gang... Miranda points to a wisp of SMOKE above one of the towers MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There! They come around, and spot the FIRE in the apartment's wi It is nine stories up, four stories below the top floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The coast looms closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Apache hovers parallel to the apartment, 20 feet away Carson feeds out a steel cable from a winch... Then throws a spring-loaded grappling hook onto the thick iron balcony railing. Hanging onto a webbed rescue harness, Carson slides quick across the line, onto the balcony. Using the butt of his 9mm, he BREAKS a hole in the glass on the locked sliding door. He reaches through and unlatches it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FLAMES have engulfed both sets of curtains and have b to creep across the floor and the ceiling. Carson glances over at the electronics on the TV: 4:55 PM The family is coughing from the smoke, trying not to pani In the kitchen, Lisa can't cough through the tape on her mouth. She's freaking out. Seeing this, Carson runs over to her and pulls the tape o She starts SCREAMING, so he grabs her face. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... work with me here! He grabs one of the refrigerator handles and pulls, but i won't come loose. Lisa cries out in frustration. LISA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, please hurry... Carson spots Javal's toolbox. In it, he finds a socket se handle, which he levers in between the refrigerator handl the door. He rips one handle loose, then the other. Carson turns his attention to the booby-trapped chairs. Lisa sits on the floor, frantically pulling her handcuffe hands around her feet so they're in front of her, then ru for the front door. Just as she reaches it: CARSON

dialogues.speaker: DON'T
dialogues.text: He grabs her before she opens the door. There's a small magnetic sensor at the top of the door jamb. CARSON (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to go out the window. MRS. HAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't you disarm the bomb? CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too risky. Let's concentrate on getting you out of here. He looks at the meters on the electronic units. CARSON (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sound detectors? MRS. HAN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sam covered them with chewing gum. SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: High-tech problem, low-tech solution. Carson looks at Sam, impressed, then peers under the chai CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pressure sensors. Use 'em in convertibles: Bad guy sits on your seat, he sets the alarm off. These are rigged backwards -- get up, you set 'em off. SAM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You a bomb expert? CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. But I've had some car alarms in my day. (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For all the goddamn good they do... Carson looks around, thinking. He spots the roll of duct on the table, grabs it and unrolls a long piece. CARSON (continuing; to Mrs. Han)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slide your arm forward... Watch the meter... Keep the pressure on the armrest with your elbow... He wraps the armrest with tape, cinching it tight. CARSON (continuing)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll squeeze the sensor, duplicate the weight of your arm... Okay... pick it up. They look at each other, scared... After a beat, she does The meter JIGGLES... but stays in the black! Everyone sig with relief. Carson repeats the process on her other armr CARSON (continuing; to Sam)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Low-tech solution... (to Mrs. Han)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lean back... Carefully. Carson feels for the sensor in the seat, finding it burie under Mrs. Han's thighs. He runs a long piece of tape aro the seat and wraps it tightly. He tries to lift Mrs. Han, but the meter moves to the red MIRANDA (VO) (thru radio in his pocket)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How's it going in there? CARSON (to himself)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nag, nag, nag... He wraps another piece of tape around the seat, and tries again to lift her. This time it works!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The missile has almost reached land.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traveling toward the Korean DMZ.

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Time: 4:58. The Apache helicopter HOVERING outside is mak an incredible racket. Carson is helping Joy get free of her chair. As she stand the pieces of her hair stuck to the gum over the micropho head begin to PULL the gum away! Mrs. Han sees the meter heading for the red, and the yell warning light flashing... She grabs Carson's arm. Carson quickly covers the mic... The meter drops to zero.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FIRE is spreading across the carpet and walls. Carson hurrying everyone out onto the small balcony. He helps Li into the rescue harness. She's terrified. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be over in five seconds... She nods. Miranda pulls her across the cable and send the harness back. Carson turns next to Sam, but he stands bac his sister can go.

dialogues.speaker: BOMB
dialogues.text: One minute... fifty-nine seconds...

dialogues.speaker: CARSON
dialogues.text: sends Sam across... the harness comes back... he straps M Han into it... CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell 'em I'm gonna release the hook and ride down on the line. He pushes her across. As soon as she's there, he gestures the Apache Pilot to move closer so he can release the hoo

dialogues.speaker: BOMB
dialogues.text: Thirty seconds... twenty-nine...

dialogues.speaker: THE HARNESS
dialogues.text: slides back across to him; Carson grabs it with one hand tries to undo the hook buckle with the other... But the cable is crooked, and the buckle is JAMMED -- if can't release it, he's stuck there! Carson tries to free hook, but it's dug in between the concrete and the railin Fifteen seconds to go... Carson looks over at the helicopter and waves them away. CARSON (shouts)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Release the cable from your side! Get out of here! MIRANDA (shouts back)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come over the railing! Grab onto the harness!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda turns to the Pilot. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tear the hook loose! PILOT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll pop the winch buckle! MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try it anyway!

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: Five seconds to go... The Apache helicopter backs away from the high-rise... The cable pulls taut... Carson wraps the webbing of the harness around his wrist. The Apache STRAINS against the resistance of the cable... The entire railing around the balcony BREAKS away, with C HANGING on the harness next to it... The helicopter turns and flies away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bomb EXPLODES, blasting a huge hole in the tower. All the windows in the nearby towers and apartments IMPLO

dialogues.speaker: CARSON
dialogues.text: is engulfed in the FIREBALL... We can't tell if he's aliv

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The force of the blast HITS them like a tidal wave. The P fights to keep control while looking for a place to set d

dialogues.speaker: BELOW
dialogues.text: Huge chunks of debris, glass, furniture, etc. rain down. Carson and the section of railing underneath the helicopt swing like a pendulum from the force of the blast. Groggy, he loosens his grasp on the harness, and jumps cl as the helicopter lands. Miranda leaps out of the Apache and runs to him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dust and debris from the explosion hang in the air; helicopters crisscross the scene. Everyone turns their eyes skyward, looking for the missil INT.  WORKERS' PARADISE HALL - P'YГљNGYANG - (INCLUDE TV)

dialogues.speaker: DAY
dialogues.text: The Premier and the High Command are watching the action Park LaBrea on CNN Live... ...As Ambassador Han embraces his family. Furious, General Kai gets up and leaves the conference ro The others look at the Premier. After a beat, he crosses PANEL OF ELECTRONICS and SLAPS a large red button on it..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cruise missile EXPLODES, completely obliterating it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead jet cuts away, turning around. The others follow

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Han family crosses to Carson, blackened and bloody, sitting on the curb next to Miranda. Ambassador Han shake his hand. Mrs. Han and Miranda cry. Joy and Sam grin at h After a beat, Carson gathers the kids up in his arms. It profound catharsis for him... EXT.  WORKERS' PARADISE HALL - P'YГљNGYANG - DAY General Kai is getting into his car. He look up as an ARM OFFICER approaches... and SHOOTS him! The Officer pushes body into the passenger's seat, gets in, and drives off.

dialogues.speaker: DARKNESS
dialogues.text: and the sound of RUNNING WATER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful ranch house and horse barn, sitting on a mead beside a brook, overlooking an unspoiled pine forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pastoral scene is a COMMERCIAL on the TV. Carson, wrapped in a towel, holds the phone and paces. CARSON (into phone)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I'll call you next week. Carson hangs up, and CLICKS off the TV as he leaves the r The sound of RUNNING WATER continues (OS)...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miranda, wearing a bathrobe, is WATERING her sickly roses Carson comes outside. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who was that on the phone? CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bureau. (beat)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They want me back on the hostage team. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you say? CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told 'em I'd sleep on it... Miranda smiles, then looks at him, surprised, as he crouc down and helps her turn the soil around the rose bushes. work in silence. Then, tentatively, she leans over and ki him. Soon they're in each other's arms, holding tight...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still entwined, Carson and Miranda stumble in. While kiss MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Working with you today was certainly... interesting, Inspector. CARSON

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's my outstanding people skills. He slips her out of her robe and they fall onto the bed. a tender, romantic moment... Until, (OS), a CAR ALARM goes off. Miranda bolts up. MIRANDA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate this fucking town... Carson ignores the ALARM -- and Miranda's comment. He pus her back onto the bed and turns off the bedside lamp. All of the books and magazines about other places to live spill from his nightstand, onto the floor...
